replies.body:
GIVE US REGULAR URF!

We do not like ARURF at all, and balance isn't a problem for us. Just for the love of God, allow us to host URF custom games, that way we can arrange picks with friends.
Entirely agree!
Atleast they should give the option for both. That way people who don't like when people play what they want can play arurf.
When is finally going to be normal URF you thots and not arurf
Big daddy riot needs to have control over us goyim.
Snow Battle ARURF

GIVE US REGULAR URF!

We do not like ARURF at all, and balance isn't a problem for us. Just for the love of God, allow us to host URF custom games, that way we can arrange picks with friends.


~Copy and Pasted from "Lovesick"~

Ps- If you guys are worried about balance then just add in bans to urf games then people can choose if they want to leave a certain champ open and risk versing them to get the chance to play them.... -Zed main here :S-

I see what you did there.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
Yet again riot, it's worse. you guys make urf worse and worse every iteration
A list of champions that are available would of been nice :l
same champ pool as ARAM which is all the champs you own plus the free to plays i believe.

nah. champ pool is restricted to champs that have ice-themed skins, and the skin is auto-locked in. 

the list: https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ja7Oh972GHQ/WhSslqNf2NI/AAAAAAAAz_Y/4gGKwCMr1bQct-_NzkFyg9UAxWiJLs9ygCLcBGAs/s640/vnClTjw.png
thank you very much for that
is it that hard to just release urf. arurf is just a pile of boredm for me
riot can you end arurf at 6/1/18{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
can u end it never?

Well if it never ended people would hate it. And people wouldn't gather together to have a shit ton of fun. It'd be a "You wanna play urf?" 'sure' But with the way the do it, it's a "Dude urf is out let's do it" 'fuck yeah'
I legit think they hate urf as they likely see a massive drop in people queuing for everything else.
Rito please can you add all champs because having a fewer selection is more boring which urf should be the opposite

replies.poster: T I G A S A O
replies.body: Fuck you riot for this shit urf
Why isn't my girl Sona{{champion:37}} in??? She has a snow AND Christmas themed skin(Silent Night)....
Noone wants to play against Sona on URF.
also we all want normL URF because this all random stuff is really bad
Why does it start at 3 am?

I think it might be because that's when the lowest amount of players are online, so if the servers go offline it affects the least amount of people. Just what I think the reason might be though, could be wrong
I think it might have more to do with our time zone, cause its a universal start time it'll be 8am in California etc
3am is URF hour when the world stops to remember URF in all his glory. It should be a daily event in your calendar... but also Raze is on the money.

so you going to give us regular ARURF/URF or are we stuck with this shit? 
also never do this again. the super limited number of champions completely ruins the fun. what the fuck were yous thinking?
*twiddles thumbs for 26 more minutes*
But I'll be asleep wtf, why do you do this to me riot?

I dont know how you do it riot but somehow you keep making one of the best game modes worse and worse everytime its up to play. Why cant you let us play the champ we want to play but just add bans tbh that dosnt  seem too hard to do.
oh so it isn't even every champ? what the fuck is the point in that then? i've versed Ezreal 5 fucking times today {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
Honestly, I'd love an ARURF on the Howling Abyss as an option you can pick.
its past 3 a.m and urf isn't up plz explain{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
AEDT not NZDT (or whatever the New Zealand version of daylight savings is)
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
can we have ascension back please? (no turret no minions too farm just the fighting)
You mean Crystal Scar map. Right?
nope i mean ascension with the big xerath at the center of the map, chek it on yt

nobody asked for ARURF. nobody complained about "balancing problems". we all played OP champs and in that sense it was "balanced" bc we all felt strong. even if your team lost the game you'd still have fun because you chose your champions. now it honestly just feels like a waste of time when ur team gets shit/unfamiliar champs or the enemy gets good ones. also people dodge from champion select often and it makes queueing up annoying.

*edit ok i've played 6 games of Snow Battle ARURF now and i do prefer it better than normal ARURF because the champion pool is smaller and nobody feels too much stronger than others. I'd be down for different versions of ARURF if it came up more often. Maybe different pools of champions a few times a year. Maybe 4 times a year during school break? Idk. just a thought/ suggestion. bc it looks like you guys are pretty adamant on not bring regular URF back ever - regardless, it would be pretty awesome if you brought back regular URF at least ONCE a year :'( just let us do a 10ban thingy every game. it works fine in Legend of the Poro King.
dont you think thats kinda not fair?
Why Do we get less time of urf and NA gets like 2 month??

You're making URF worse and worse and I don't understand why. It's like you're doing it on purpose since it's so requested, as if you want us to get over it. At first it was pure fun and laughter, now you can't pick a champ and you can get stuck with one you don't enjoy, even worse when you have to play it against an OP champ and you can't outplay since you are not familiar with yours. Now you even restricted the champion pool. And the summoner spells. Also, if Teemo and Shaco have a limit on the traps, why not limit Veigar's stacks too? Even if you win the first trades there's no way to take him 5 mins later cause he has already stacked 214324324 ap spamming Q. What's next, no rerolls?
Just give us normal URF AND make it so we can have customer URF. Why don't you want to give us what we want?! THE CUSTOMER IS ALWAYS RIGHT RITO! I cri errydai nd errinit till it hppn...

None of my favourite champs are on the list :(

Still enjoy the game mode, but disappointed how diluted URF is this time around. Unlocking all champs would be a start, and removing the random would be better (or include URF and ARURF - I’ll head to ARURF when I’m over OP/same picks every game).

Cmon ppl, for the players!

Gotta love the legion of kids complaining about "Where is regular urf!!!" despite how terrible it really was. Yeah sure picking who you want sounds better than random but when every game has a Garen or a Fizz it isn't much different from the last game. If every game is the same, why bother playing another?
Ill be asleep at 3 am tho....
